version_description:
This is a minor update fixing an issue with App Preview.

Other recent improvements:
- We added a new "Section Spacing" adjustment option. It gives you finer control over how much content you can fit on a page.
- Fixed a small bug that could cause unexpected behaviour with bulleted lists.
- Fixed a few minor issues in some templates.

We changed the business model of the app.

The app is now free with the ability to upgrade for more templates and features. All existing users will be able to continue using the app with all its templates and features without the need to upgrade / pay again. Should content appear locked although you previously paid for the app, please use the "Restore Purchases" button in the upgrade view.
This version fixes an issue with validating a user's in-app purchase.

iPhone Version
We developed an iPhone version of Resumes by Nobody. Check it out on the App Store!

New Document Browser with iCloud (on iOS 11)
If you run iOS 11, you can take advantage of the new sytem-wide document browser and its iCloud Drive (or other cloud storage) capabilities. Start your resume on your iPad and continue editing it on your iPhone.

Improved Bulleted List Algorithm
In rare occasions, the bulleted lists could look off in the preview. We fixed it.

If you like our app ...
Please consider writing a review. It really helps us out and enables us to continue improving this app.

Sincerely,
Nobody

REBRANDING
We are rebranding the app as Resume Builder by Nobody.


From version 1.1.0:

iPhone Version
We developed an iPhone version of Resumes by Nobody. Check it out on the App Store!

New Document Browser with iCloud (on iOS 11)
If you run iOS 11, you can take advantage of the new sytem-wide document browser and its iCloud Drive (or other cloud storage) capabilities. Start your resume on your iPad and continue editing it on your iPhone.

Improved Bulleted List Algorithm
In rare occasions, the bulleted lists could look off in the preview. We fixed it.

If you like our app ...
Please consider writing a review. It really helps us out and enables us to continue improving this app.

Sincerely,
Nobody

IPHONE X READY
We made the app compatible with the new iPhone X.

MINOR BUG FIX
We fixed a small bug that could occur when exporting a resume.

IF YOU LIKE OUR APP ...
Please consider writing a review. It would really help us out.

Sincerely,
Nobody

MAC APP
Resume Builder by Nobody is now available on the Mac App Store.

MAC APP COMPATIBILITY
We added file compatibility between our iOS and Mac apps.

MINOR BUG FIXES
We fixed a few minor bugs.

IF YOU LIKE OUR APP ...
Please consider writing a review. It would really help us out.

AR Preview​
Preview your cover letter, resume and references in augmented reality. See what your job application would look like if it were printed.
​​
Improved Multitasking Support on iPad
The app now supports all orientations, Split View and you can use drag and drop to add a photo to your resume.

Fixes
We fixed an issue that prevented the thumbnail of the resume file from updating and other minor bugs.


We love improving this app and hope you enjoy using it!

This is a minor update adding App Previews for iPhone. See our new features from version 1.2.0 below:

AR Preview​
Preview your cover letter, resume and references in augmented reality. See what your job application would look like if it were printed.
​​
Improved Multitasking Support on iPad
The app now supports all orientations, Split View and you can use drag and drop to add a photo to your resume.

Fixes
We fixed an issue that prevented the thumbnail of the resume file from updating and other minor bugs.

If you like our app ...
Please consider writing a review. It would really help us out.


We love improving this app and hope you enjoy using it!

Sincerely,
Nobody

A minor update addressing some stability and performance improvements.

We love improving this app and hope you enjoy using it!

We fixed some bugs:
- Fixed an issue that would cause a crash when upgrading on iPad in Portrait orientation.
- Fixed an issue that caused the preview to reload twice after an orientation change on iPad.
- Fixed an issue that caused a crash when trying to email without having email set up in the Settings app.

If you like our app ...
Please consider writing a review. It would really help us out.

We love improving this app and hope you enjoy using it!

Sincerely,
Nobody

iOS and iPadOS 13
We added compatibility with iOS and iPadOS 13.

Dark Mode
Enjoy the new Dark Mode on iOS and iPadOS 13.

Improved Export UI
We improved the way you export or print your resume.

Bug Fix
We fixed an issue that could cause the app to crash during editing.


From version 3.1.0:

iOS and iPadOS 13
We added compatibility with iOS and iPadOS 13.

Dark Mode
Enjoy the new Dark Mode on iOS and iPadOS 13.

Improved Export UI
We improved the way you export or print your resume.

Minor Update
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Another Substantial Update:
- New Beautiful Icon
- Collapsable Resume Sections
- Mouse Support on iPad
